title: Kylie Jenner shares adorable video of Stormi playing with friends
text:
Kylie Jenner has shared an adorable video (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie Jenner just posted the most adorable videos of Stormi watching The Little Mermaid, having swimming lessons and then playing with her friends.

The 22-year-old billionaire took to her Instagram Stories on Friday to share the unbelievably cute milestones for her one-year-old daughter.

The first video shows little Stormi standing on the couch enthralled by Disney’s The Little Mermaid, as Kylie asks: ‘You like this movie?’ and she sheepishly responds ‘Yeah’.

Kylie grabs her daughter’s hand as they cheer and smile together.

The next two stories are of Kylie watching filming her daughter’s swimming lesson from the balcony above.

these girls are getting so big i can’t handle it 😍 .. thank you God for them ♥️ pic.twitter.com/LSlQOCnCRZ — Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 4, 2019

A swimming teacher counts to three and tries to get Stormi to put her head under the water but she suddenly excitedly shouts: ‘Mummy!’ and the swimming lesson takes a little detour.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The countdown begins again as the swimming teacher sends Stormi off in the water and encourages her to ‘kick’ and ‘keep going’.

Stormi triumphantly grabs on to the barrier in the pool and Kylie lets out a cheer of amazement and shouts: ‘Good job, baby!’

And if that wasn’t enough, Kylie also uploaded a video of Stormi (on both Instagram and Twitter) playing with her friends on some playgound equipment.

She captioned the video: ‘These girls are getting so big, I can’t handle it. Thank you God for them.’

Travis Scott and Kylie Jenner recently split (Picture: Rich Fury/Getty Images)

The kids laugh hysterically as they turn cogs in a wheel, jumping up and down in amazement.

Kylie, can you please let us breathe with all of these adorable moments!

The videos comes about after the shock split of Stormi’s dad, Travis Scott, and Kylie earlier this week.

Kylie confirmed the split on Twitter on Thursday evening: ‘Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi. Or friendship and our daughter is priority.’

The couple were together for two years and have now agreed to co-parent little Stormi.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Kylie Jenner just shared the most adorable videos of Stormi learning to swim, playing with friends and watching The Little Mermaid.
